sen.j: 貞応3年（1224年）7月、夫義時の急死後、兄光宗と共に実子である政村を幕府執権に、娘婿の一条実雅を将軍に擁立しようと図る。
sen.e: After the sudden death of her husband Yoshitoki, in July 1224, Iga no Kata and her older brother Mitsumune attempted to make her biological son Masamune the regent of the bakufu, and her son-in-low Sanemasa ICHIJO the shogun.

sen.j: しかし、尼将軍北条政子が政村の異母兄北条泰時を義時の後継者とした事により失敗。
sen.e: The attempt however failed because ama shogun (nun warload) Masako HOJO made Yasutoki HOJO, who was Masamura's older half brother, the successor of Yoshitoki.
